resources.string: \nWelcome to RobuxEarny! An user-friendly application where you can effortlessly earn Robux! You just need to play a very simple scratch card game, It\'s completely free and you will be able to redeem your robux by accumulating your coins!
Please finish your current ticket first.
Earn a lot of points and redeem Robux!
The best and fastest app for earning Robux

\nThis app has a special coin system with six packages.\\nEach package comes with a different amount of coins that corresponds to a different amount of Robux. By playing fun scratch cards, you can earn coins. The more coins you earn, the more packages you can unlock. This means you\'ll have more chances to earn Robux! It\'s a simple way to earn Robux and have fun along the way!
"\nWhen you are ready press the start button below and start right now to earn a lot of Robux!\\n In order to send you the Robux don't forget to click on the ads as much as you can.\n"
